text: Its true. I confirmed he supported the withdrawal from Paris.

As an alternative to the census idea, why not a discussion on how the community should act in response to the climate crisis. Science says it’s a very serious issue and much worse than many people think. 

For example even if miraculously CO2 emissions were stopped now, the planets temperature will still climb 0.5c to 1.0c more due to emissions already locked into the system.
